Actions.Name: Spear
Actions.Effects: If attacking an adjacent foe, deals bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Backflip
Actions.Description: The [name] dashes 1. If there is an adjacent foe, increase this dash to 2, and shove that foe 1.

Actions.Name: Net
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a net terrain effect in a free space range. The net space is treated as a pit and difficult terrain.

Actions.Name: Main Harpoon
Actions.Description: A foe in range must save or take 2[D]+[fray], become shattered, and be shoved towards the [name] until adjacent. On a success, the foe takes [fray] and is shoved 1 towards the [name] instead.
